insertOrUpdateDatabase

public static boolean insertOrUpdateDatabase(java.sql.Connection db,
                                             java.lang.String tableName,
                                             java.util.Map field_value,
                                             java.lang.String Pk)
Insert a record. If the record already exists in the database(duplicated PK), update the record Note: Pk should be one of the key in the map(hashtable)

Parameters:
db - Connection
tableName - String
field_value - Map
Pk - String
Returns:
boolean
Since:
2005-03-03

insertOrUpdateDatabase

public static boolean insertOrUpdateDatabase(java.sql.Connection db,
                                             java.lang.String tableName,
                                             java.util.Map field_value,
                                             java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> Pks)
Insert a record. If the record already exists in the database(duplicated PK), update the record Note: Pk should be one or more keys in the map(hashtable)

Parameters:
db - Connection
tableName - String
field_value - Map
Pks - Vector - the set of primary keys
Returns:
boolean
Since:
2005-04-22
